Event.name: Prank
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Joker</fen>, by means of a <fen>Prank</fen>, arranges to deceive a <fen>Victim</fen>, with the result that some harm or embarrassment comes to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
<ex><fex name="jok">They</fex> always <m>play</m> <fex name="pra"><t>pranks</t></fex> <fex name="vic">on me</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Prank
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Prank</fen> is a device, strategy, or system designed to mislead and cause harm and amusement to a <fen>Victim</fen> (and possibly others observing the prank).</def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Joker</fen> intends to mislead and cause harm to the <fen>Victim</fen> by means of the <fen>Prank</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: prank.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a trick intended to cause amusement and sometimes harm.

lexUnit.name: practical joke.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a trick intended to cause amusement or embarrassment, often with a physical element.
